name: Inverteb
description:
An entry for LudumDare39

You gain an object of esoteric power.  Transcend before you revert to mortality.

Controls:

WASD:   Movement
Space:  Jump
Hold Shift (or E):  Shift between realities
Mouse:  Camera

Mechanics:

Do not fall, do not run out of power.
Obtaining green fetishes restores power.
Entering the other world will increase your speed, prevent your power from depleting, and enlighten you with the vision of a god.

Credits:

David Allen (@fraudSound):  Sound, Music, Implementation
Henry Wheeler-Mackta (@Whackta):   Lead Programmer, Level Design
Connor Thornberg:  Art
Bailey Sostek (@BayjoseJava):  Particle Programming

Play it Loud and Large.

All original code, art, sound, and music.
Developed in Unreal Engine 4.16.
